TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示組態檔內相關的區段群組。

span.span: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 設定 （例如 Web.config 檔） 的組態檔中會組織成區段。Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections. 因為相關的某些小節，通常很方便可以將它們分組區段群組中。Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group. 類別代表`sectionGroup`XML 項目中定義時，用來群組區段`configSections`組態檔元素。The class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file. 可以巢狀區段群組 （區段群組可以包含其他區段群組，以及各節）。Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections). 下列範例所示`configSections`定義三個巢狀的區段群組項目：The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ```
``` 組態系統載入設定從組態檔案將物件。The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into objects. 您可以使用和屬性存取的區段或區段群組中所包含的物件。You can use the and properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a object. 如需如何從組態檔中存取資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來擷取組態設定。The following example shows how to use the class to retrieve configuration settings. 此範例會讀取組態設定，並將資訊寫入有關每個組態區段群組和主控台的章節中的主控台應用程式。The example is a console application that reads configuration settings and writes information about each configuration section group and the sections in it to the console. `Main`方法會載入到組態設定物件，擷取集合而使之物件，然後呼叫`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法顯示的區段屬性值。The `Main` method loads the configuration settings into a object, retrieves the collection from the object, and then calls the `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method to display the section property values. `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法會逐一區段群組和呼叫`ShowSectionGroupInfo`針對每個方法。The `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method iterates through the section groups and calls the `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method for each one. `ShowSectionGroupInfo`方法會顯示名稱區段群組中，某些屬性值和它包含區段的名稱。The `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method displays the name of the section group, some property values, and the names of the sections that it contains. 如果這個區段群組包含區段群組，這個方法會呼叫`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`以遞迴方式顯示這些區段群組。If the section group contains section groups, this method calls `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` recursively to display those section groups. `indentLevel`欄位用來顯示的每一行顯示邏輯群組的左邊加入空格。The `indentLevel` field is used to add spaces to the left side of displayed lines to show logical groupings. 所有行都限於 79 個字元的文字，以避免換行，這會導致難以區分邏輯群組。All lines are limited to 79 characters of text to avoid line wrapping, which would make it harder to distinguish the logical groupings. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

summary.span: 強制為此 物件進行宣告。

span.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使它不需要因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的物件。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

summary.span: 強制為此 物件進行宣告。

span.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制這寫入至檔案，如果宣告`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`是`false`，可能會忽略這個動作，如果物件必須由系統。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the object is required by the system. 方法可以強制寫入組態檔，即使它不需要因為它已經宣告為父檔案中的物件。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 此外，它可以從組態檔移除群組如果不是必要的群組。Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required. 您可能想要使用方法以進行檔案從一部電腦移植至另一個，而不需擔心是否群組宣告已經存在的組態。You might want to use the method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果組態檔中宣告這個區段群組屬性會傳回`true`。If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the property returns `true`. 屬性會傳回`false`如果此區段會繼承自 Machine.config 或父層設定檔。The property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會決定是否此執行個體宣告。The following code example determines whether this instance of is declared. 這是如概觀中所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This is part of a larger example provided in the overview for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion(class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion (targetFramework As FrameworkName) As Boolean

span.span: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

summary.span: 表示目前的 執行個體是否應該在組態物件階層架構針對指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目標版本序列化時予以序列化。

span.span: Indicates whether the current instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: 如果應該序列化目前的區段群組，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的每個組態區段群組[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但只有這個區段群組是指定之版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段群組[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 換句話說，如果組態區段群組實施者不會覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段群組會序列化所有的 framework 版本。In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
